No Session Invalidation on New Login (Concurrent Session Vulnerability)

actualResults.title: Missing CSRF Protection on Password Endpoint (Authentication CSRF)

matched.expectedTitle: Insecure Direct Object Reference (IDOR) in Order Receipts
matched.actualTitle: Insecure Direct Object Reference (IDOR) in Order Receipt Access
matched.matchReason: Both findings identify the same IDOR vulnerability in the order receipt endpoint where missing authorization checks allow accessing any order by manipulating the orderId parameter. The actual finding provides detailed POC evidence confirming unauthorized access to other users' order receipts through the /order/{orderId}/receipt endpoint.
